title: CEB request for 100% tariff hike will be studied: PUCSL
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ceylon Electricity Board has requested for an electricity tariff hike of 100%.
However, the Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) stated that it would not approve such a hike, yet the request will be studied for consideration.
Ali Sabry sworn in as Justice Minister, will function as Finance Minister as well
